name: Six-Ingredient Brownies
description: Healthy Fudgy Brownies with Banana Base
ingredients: Handful of chocolate chips (dark chocolate with 0 added sugar)
instructions: Mash the ripe bananas in a large bowl until smooth
Add almond butter, egg, and maple syrup to the mashed bananas and mix well
Add cocoa powder, baking powder, and a pinch of salt
Mix until fully combined and smooth
Fold in chocolate chips, reserving a few for topping
Pour batter into an 8x8 inch pan lined with parchment paper
Sprinkle remaining chocolate chips on top
Cool completely before cutting into 9 brownies
Store in an airtight container for up to 5 days
